meta.title: Copiague Public Schools Students & Families | COVID-19 Information

a.title: Walter G. O'Connell Copiague High School

li.a: Walter G. O'Connell Copiague High School

a.title: Walter G. O'Connell Copiague High School

li.a: Walter G. O'Connell Copiague High School

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 153);

h5.strong: By order of Governor Cuomo, New State Schools are closed through May 15th, 2020.

hr.p:
April 4, 2020
The Copiague Public Schools mourns the untimely passing of Board of Education Vice President Christopher Madden. Mr. Madden was a staunch supporter and tireless advocate of our students, staff and community and he will be deeply missed. We will remember him for his commitment and dedication to the Copiague community and his altruistic spirit.
We extend our sincere thoughts and deepest condolences to his family and friends during this difficult time.

hr.h3: If you would like to pick up your child's medical prescription that was held in your school's nurses office, please email us at health@copiague.net and provide the following information:

div.p:
Copiague School District Central Offices
2650 Great Neck Road, Copiague, New York 11726
(631) 842-4015
